mapper.select: SELECT jobname, jobtitle, empexpiry FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS r, a.* FROM ( SELECT a.jobname, a.jobtitle, a.empexpiry FROM pj_employ a WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY a.jobname,a.jobtitle, a.empexpiry ORDER BY jobname DESC ) a, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) b ) temp WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
